DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to assess if a dialog tool can improve compliance and asthma control in patients with asthma.
DOC.brief_title: Improved Quality of the Treatment and Increased Compliance in Asthmatics Through the Dialog Tool Soren - Between Patient and Caregiver
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of asthma >/= 3 months, Prescribed daily use of inhaled glucocorticosteroid Asthma exacerbation within the last month
